item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 28, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Hetzner raises prices while significantly lowering bandwidth (US) (145 points | 78 comments)
2. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (194 points | 21 comments)
3. The success and failure of Ninja (2020) (64 points | 19 comments)
4. Send someone you appreciate an official 'Continue and Persist' Letter (59 points | 3 comments)
5. Goodbye, Rust. I wish you success but I'm back to C++ (sorry, it is a rant) (64 points | 32 comments)
6. A pretty visualisation of the European power grid (2022) (183 points | 89 comments)
7. In the Rockets' Red Glare: The past and future of hot-rodding in America (24 points | 11 comments)
8. Tk9.0: CGo-free, cross platform GUI toolkit for Go (111 points | 31 comments)
9. AI and the Last Mile 2: Subsidiarity (12 points | discuss)
10. Rapid colonization of a space-returned Ryugu sample by terrestrial microorganism (31 points | 10 comments)
11. Bootkitty: Analyzing the first UEFI bootkit for Linux (92 points | 38 comments)
12. A new start after 60: I became a 'hummingbird' for people with dementia (63 points | 3 comments)
13. The great abandonment: what happens to the natural world when people disappear? (41 points | 39 comments)
14. You can use C-Reduce for any language (446 points | 101 comments)
15. Float Self-Tagging (25 points | 39 comments)
16. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (135 points | 69 comments)
17. QwQ: Alibaba's O1-like reasoning LLM (268 points | 203 comments)
18. London's 850-year-old food markets to close (230 points | 196 comments)
19. Every Hands-Free Driving System Available in 2024 (4 points | 1 comment)
20. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (958 points | 494 comments)
21. In Praise of Print: Reading Is Essential in an Era of Epistemological Collapse (281 points | 252 comments)
22. Bananas: Cross-Platform screen sharing made simple (159 points | 44 comments)
23. PRoot: User-space implementation of chroot, mount –bind, and binfmt_misc (112 points | 40 comments)
24. A washing machine for human beings, from 1970 (112 points | 150 comments)
25. MIT Aluminum Bicycle Project 1974 (2016) (165 points | 128 comments)
26. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (107 points | 92 comments)
27. Show HN: Voice-Pro – AI Voice Cloning (223 points | 146 comments)
28. The Forgotten Story of How IBM Invented the Automated Fab (167 points | 38 comments)
29. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (235 points | 79 comments)
30. WasmCloud makes strides with WASM component model (29 points | discuss)
